Description: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  This enhancement gives many of your damaging powers a 12% chance to heal you for a minor amount.  Additionally, this enhancement reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Peacebringers and Warshades and may be slotted into any of their damage powers.
